::DarkMouse:;

She looked at Quickstrike,"No I'm not Bailin' on ya.  I'm staying." 
she started shaking again.  She closed her optics and tried to ignore 
it, but couldn't.  She tried to cover up her shaking by talking. 
"I'm stayng. But I don't like the idea of all this.  We have to get 
out of here.  Those aliens aren't going to give up so easily and 
neither is Megatron.  He wants us all dead.  If he can get the aliens 
to kill us off, he'd do it too.  we re in danger.And staying here 
isn't going to help."  her body shook a little harder now.  She still 
stood there, refusing to give in. 
She turned and looked at Aracnia. "SO, what do you want us to do.?"
She had a look of fear in her eyes and anger on her face. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> "Nice shot," Quickstrike said when he saw the body of the alien 
fall. 
> He looked to Black Arachnia. "Remind me not t'--" He turned his 
head 
> around to hear Dark Mouse. He frowned and turned to the rodent. He 
> narrowed his crimson optics from his distance and jogged off to 
her. 
> He bent down with his odd, mismatched hands on his knees, and 
> said, "What are ya doin'? Ya bailin' us?"
